Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png"
wait(3) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Candle = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter
Tool.Enabled = true
function plant(pos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 10000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) * bg.P bg.cframe = Candle.CFrame
local bomb = Tool.Handle:Clone() bomb.CanCollide = true bomb.Transparency = 0 bomb.Position = pos bomb.Name = "Shell" bomb.Locked = true
bg.Parent = bomb
local p = Instance.new("Part") p.FormFactor = 3 p.Size = Vector3.new(1.8, 0.2, 0.2) p.Parent = game.Workspace p.Name = "Fuse"
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = p fire.Heat = 1.0 fire.Size = 1.0
p.Transparency = 1.0
pWeld = Instance.new("Weld") pWeld.Parent = bomb pWeld.Part0 = bomb pWeld.Part1 = p pWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1)
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = bomb
bomb.Parent = game.Workspace local new_script = Tool.BombScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = bomb
wait(1.5) if p then p:Remove() end end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 plant(Tool.Handle.Position) wait(24) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local FuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") FuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11565378" FuseSound.Parent = script.Parent FuseSound:Play()
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") local candle = script.Parent local initPos = candle.Position local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local particles = {}
force.Parent = candle
local colors = {Color3.new(1,0,0), Color3.new(0,1,0), Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(1, .5, 0), Color3.new(0, .5, 1), Color3.new(1,0,1), Color3.new(.1, .1, .1), Color3.new(1,1,0), Color3.new(0,1,1)}
for i = 1, 10 do force.force = candle.CFrame.lookVector * candle:GetMass() * 98 * 3 wait(.1) end
force:Remove()
local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Rocket shot.wav" sound.Parent = script.Parent sound.Volume = 1 sound:Play()
local numOfParticles = 30 particles = {}
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.P = 700 bodyPos.D = 750 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * bodyPos.P
for j= 1, numOfParticles do local p = Instance.new("Part") p.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) p.Transparency = 1 p.CanCollide = false p.Position = candle.Position p.Velocity = candle.Velocity debris:AddItem(p, 23) local s = Instance.new("Sparkles") s.Color = colors[math.random(1, #colors)] s.Parent = p table.insert(particles, p) local f = Instance.new("BodyForce") f.force = Vector3.new(0, 600, 0) f.Parent = p debris:AddItem(f, 3) local increment = (math.pi *2)/numOfParticles local angle = increment * j local pos = Vector3.new(((p.Position.x - initPos.x) * math.cos(angle)) - ((p.Position.y - initPos.y) * math.sin(angle)) +initPos.x, ((p.Position.x - initPos.x) * math.sin(angle)) + ((p.Position.y - initPos.y) * math.cos(angle)) + initPos.y,p.Position.z) local bodyPosForce = bodyPos:clone() bodyPosForce.position = Vector3.new(pos.x,pos.y + 80, pos.z) local bodyAngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(50,50,50) bodyAngularVelocity.P = 500 bodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * bodyAngularVelocity.P p.Parent = game.Workspace bodyPosForce.Parent = p bodyAngularVelocity.Parent = p end
candle.Transparency = 1 wait(2) candle:Remove() wait(3)
for i = 1, #particles do particles[i].BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(initPos.x, initPos.y + 10, initPos.z) end
wait(3) for i =1, #particles do particles[i].BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(particles[i].Position.x + math.random(-40, 40), initPos.y + math.random(40, 80), particles[i].Position.z + math.random(-40, 40)) end
wait(2.0) for i =1, #particles do for j = 1, 4 do local newSpark = particles[i]:clone() newSpark.BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(particles[i].Position.x + math.random(-40, 40), initPos.y + math.random(0, 60), particles[i].Position.z + math.random(-40, 40)) newSpark.Sparkles.Color = colors[math.random(1,#colors)] newSpark.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(newSpark, 5) end end
wait(4.5) local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure = 5 e.BlastRadius = 15 for i = 1, #particles do particles[i].BodyPosition:remove() local upForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") upForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 250, 0) upForce.Parent = particles[i] end wait(1) for i = 1, #particles do local exp = e:clone() exp.Position = particles[i].Position exp.Parent = game.Workspace particles[i]:remove() if FuseSound then FuseSound:Play() end wait(0.2) end
